Package org.tedros.fx.presenter.dynamic.behavior

Class TDynaViewSimpleBaseBehavior<M extends TModelView,​E extends org.tedros.server.model.ITModel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tedros.fx.presenter.behavior.TBehavior<M,​TDynaPresenter<M>>
      • org.tedros.fx.presenter.dynamic.behavior.TDynaViewSimpleBaseBehavior<M,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    M -
    E -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.tedros.api.presenter.behaviour.ITBehavior<M,​TDynaPresenter<M>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TDetailFieldBaseBehavior, TDynaViewActionBaseBehavior, TDynaViewCrudBaseBehavior, TDynaViewReportBaseBehavior, TDynaViewSelectionBaseBehavior, TViewBehavior
    public abstract class TDynaViewSimpleBaseBehavior<M extends TModelView,​E extends org.tedros.server.model.ITModel>
extends TBehavior<M,​TDynaPresenter<M>>
    The basic behavior for the TDynaView view. This behavior is applied on views and models that don't need to access the business layer on the application server. For model processing use TModelProcess in the TModelView.
    Author:
    Davis Gordon
